description: This file defines a class 'MarkdownChunking' that implements a strategy for chunking markdown documents based on their structure, such as headers and paragraphs. It includes methods for partitioning markdown content, handling temporary files, and splitting documents into chunks with optional overlap.

classes.name: MarkdownChunking
classes.description: A chunking strategy that splits markdown based on structure like headers, paragraphs and sections

methods.name: __init__
methods.description: Initializes the MarkdownChunking with optional chunk size and overlap parameters.

methods.name: _partition_markdown_content
methods.description: Partitions markdown content into chunks, falling back to paragraph splitting if necessary.

methods.name: chunk
methods.description: Splits a Document object into smaller chunks based on markdown structure or paragraph fallback.
